languages.text: Лорд-капитану предстояло решить, какую из трех команд он{mf||а} возглавит лично, а какие две доверит их офицерам. Да будут же вам известны имена тех честных людей, что стояли в тот миг перед лицом нашего Вольного Торговца:

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитану предстояло решить, какую из трех команд он{mf||а} возглавит лично, а какие две доверит их офицерам. Да будут же вам известны имена тех честных людей, что стояли в тот миг перед лицом нашего Вольного Торговца:

languages.text: The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитану предстояло решить, какую из трех команд он{mf||а} возглавит лично, а какие две доверит их офицерам. Да будут же вам известны имена тех честных людей, что стояли в тот миг перед лицом нашего Вольного Торговца:

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} tenía que decidir cuál de los tres equipos lideraría y qué dos estarían en manos de sus oficiales. A continuación constan los nombres de los valientes que se presentaron ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente:
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} tenía que decidir cuál de los tres equipos lideraría y qué dos estarían en manos de sus oficiales. A continuación constan los nombres de los valientes que se presentaron ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente:

languages.text: 舰长大人需要决定{mf|他|她}将亲自指挥哪支探索队，哪两支探索队将会被委托给可靠的军官。现在咱们一起来看看，那些被行商浪人亲自委任的可靠军官都是谁吧。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人需要决定{mf|他|她}将亲自指挥哪支探索队，哪两支探索队将会被委托给可靠的军官。现在咱们一起来看看，那些被行商浪人亲自委任的可靠军官都是谁吧。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは3つのチームのうち、自分が率いる1チームと士官に任せる2チームを決めなければならない。ここで、自由開拓者の前に立った誠実な人材の名前を紹介しよう。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは3つのチームのうち、自分が率いる1チームと士官に任せる2チームを決めなければならない。ここで、自由開拓者の前に立った誠実な人材の名前を紹介しよう。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain musste entscheiden, welches der drei Teams {mf|er|sie} selbst anführen wollte, und welche beiden Offizieren überlassen wurden. Darum seien hier die Namen der ehrbaren Leute genannt, die just in diesem Moment vor {mf|unserem Freihändler|unserer Freihändlerin} standen:
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain musste entscheiden, welches der drei Teams {mf|er|sie} selbst anführen wollte, und welche beiden Offizieren überlassen wurden. Darum seien hier die Namen der ehrbaren Leute genannt, die just in diesem Moment vor {mf|unserem Freihändler|unserer Freihändlerin} standen:

languages.text: {name} devait maintenant choisir l'équipe qu'{mf|il|elle} dirigerait et confier les deux autres à leurs officiers. Présentons donc ces honnêtes gens qui se tenaient devant notre {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} à ce moment :
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

traits.locale_text: {name} devait maintenant choisir l'équipe qu'{mf|il|elle} dirigerait et confier les deux autres à leurs officiers. Présentons donc ces honnêtes gens qui se tenaient devant notre {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} à ce moment :

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, zor bir seçimle karşı karşıyaydı: Önderliğini bekleyen üç takımdan hangisine yol göstereceğini seçmesi gerekiyordu. Kalan iki takım ise subaylarına emanet edilecekti. Gelin, tam o anda Hür Tacir'in karşısında duran, o dürüst insanların adını da zikredelim.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain had to decide which of the three teams {mf|he|she} would lead, and which two would be entrusted to their officers. Let here be known the names of those honest people who stood before our Rogue Trader in that moment:

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, zor bir seçimle karşı karşıyaydı: Önderliğini bekleyen üç takımdan hangisine yol göstereceğini seçmesi gerekiyordu. Kalan iki takım ise subaylarına emanet edilecekti. Gelin, tam o anda Hür Tacir'in karşısında duran, o dürüst insanların adını da zikredelim.
